曠.definition: to neglect; to skip (class or work); to waste (time); vast; loose-fitting

曠世.definition: incomparable; none to compare with at that time

曠代.definition: unrivalled; without peer in this generation

曠古.definition: since the dawn of time; from the year dot

曠古未有.definition: never before in the whole of history (idiom); unprecedented

曠古未聞.definition: never before in the whole of history (idiom); unprecedented; also written 曠古未有|旷古未有

曠工.definition: to skip work; absence without leave

曠職.definition: to fail to show up for work

曠課.definition: to play truant; to cut classes
